meanings.definition: Provide furniture, especially seats, with padding, springs, webbing, and fabric or leather covers.
meanings.sent1: She upholstered the old chair to make it more comfortable.
meanings.sent2: The sofa was upholstered in a soft, blue fabric.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the newly upholstered couch was a giant scratching post.
meanings.sent4: Her words upholstered his wounded pride.
meanings.sent5: The upholstered armchair felt like sitting on a cloud.

meanings.definition: The materials used to upholster something.
meanings.sent1: The store had a wide selection of upholstery for sale.
meanings.sent2: He admired the quality of the upholstery on the car seats.
meanings.sent3: The dog mistook the pile of upholstery for a cozy bed.
meanings.sent4: The rich upholstery of the curtains added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The upholstery shop specialized in custom-made designs.
